materials.raw_text:
Calcium Carbonate (CaCO3) - 150 g 
 Lanthanum Oxide (La2O3) - 30 g 
 Lithium Carbonate (Li2CO3) - 40 g 
 Silicon Dioxide (SiO2) - 220 g

preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out each ingredient using a precision scale. 
 2. In a clean, dry mixing bowl, combine 150 g of Calcium Carbonate, 30 g of Lanthanum Oxide, 40 g of Lithium Carbonate, and 220 g of Silicon Dioxide. 
 3. Use a spatula to thoroughly mix the dry ingredients until a uniform mixture is obtained. 
 4. If available, use a mortar and pestle to further grind the mixture to a fine powder.
